title: Ticket #3933: improve documentation for why a job is on hold
description: Introduce a bit of prose to say why jobs go on hold, the job attributes that represent information about why a job is on hold, and include index entries so that folks may find this information.
check_ins: 2014-Sep-23 14:04   Check-in [41224]: added user manual intro to why jobs are on hold and what to do; fixed typos found while adding the info #3933 (By Karen Miller )
